fantasy.name: Warrior
fantasy.description: A strong and brave fighter skilled in hand-to-hand combat. Warriors are known for their physical strength and ability to wear heavy armor and wield various weapons.

sci-fi.name: Space Marine
sci-fi.description: An elite soldier equipped with advanced armor and weaponry, trained for combat in various environments, including space and alien worlds.

fantasy.name: Mage
fantasy.description: A wielder of arcane powers, capable of casting powerful spells. Mages often have a deep knowledge of ancient lore and mystical artifacts.

sci-fi.name: Tech Wizard
sci-fi.description: A master of advanced technology, manipulating digital environments and hacking into secure systems with ease.

fantasy.name: Rogue
fantasy.description: A cunning and agile character, adept in stealth and surprise attacks. Rogues are skilled in lockpicking, pickpocketing, and finding traps.

sci-fi.name: Infiltrator
sci-fi.description: Specializing in stealth and espionage, this agent excels in gathering intelligence and sabotaging enemy operations.

fantasy.name: Healer
fantasy.description: A compassionate and skilled medic who can heal wounds and cure diseases. Healers are essential in supporting their team in and out of battle.

sci-fi.name: Field Medic
sci-fi.description: Equipped with advanced medical technology, this medic is capable of treating injuries and illnesses in the harsh conditions of alien planets.

fantasy.name: Ranger
fantasy.description: A master of survival and tracking in the wilderness. Rangers are skilled in archery, animal handling, and navigating through natural terrains.

sci-fi.name: Scout
sci-fi.description: An expert in reconnaissance and survival in diverse environments, using high-tech equipment for navigation and observation.

fantasy.name: Necromancer
fantasy.description: A practitioner of dark arts, able to summon and control the undead. Necromancers possess knowledge of forbidden spells and curses.

sci-fi.name: Bio-Engineer
sci-fi.description: A scientist specializing in genetic manipulation, creating and controlling genetically-modified organisms for various purposes.

fantasy.name: Paladin
fantasy.description: A holy warrior imbued with divine powers. Paladins are dedicated to fighting evil, healing the innocent, and inspiring those around them.

sci-fi.name: Galactic Knight
sci-fi.description: A noble warrior sworn to uphold the peace across the galaxy, wielding advanced energy weapons and armored suits.

fantasy.name: Assassin
fantasy.description: A master of deadly arts, specializing in quick and silent elimination of targets. Assassins are experts in poisons, daggers, and stealth tactics.

sci-fi.name: Eliminator
sci-fi.description: A highly trained operative skilled in the art of elimination, using futuristic weaponry and cloaking technology.

fantasy.name: Bard
fantasy.description: A charismatic performer with the power to inspire and manipulate through music and speech. Bards are knowledgeable in lore and skilled in diplomacy.

sci-fi.name: Diplomat
sci-fi.description: An expert in intergalactic relations and communication, skilled in negotiation and conflict resolution among different alien species.

fantasy.name: Alchemist
fantasy.description: A scholar of chemical and magical sciences, capable of creating potions and elixirs. Alchemists are adept at manipulating physical and magical substances.

sci-fi.name: Chemist
sci-fi.description: A scientist expert in chemical engineering and nanotechnology, developing advanced substances and materials.
